### The Pandoc template

### `fancyheader` and `lastpage`

```
\usepackage[includeheadfoot,margin=0.5in, paperwidth = \pgwidth, paperheight = \pgheight]{geometry}
\usepackage{fancyhdr}
\usepackage{lastpage}
\fancypagestyle{body}{
\fancyhf{}
\renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{0.4pt}
\renewcommand{\headrule}{\hbox to\headwidth{\color{lightgray}\leaders\hrule height \headrulewidth\hfill}}
\renewcommand{\footrulewidth}{0.4pt}
\renewcommand{\footrule}{\hbox to\headwidth{\color{lightgray}\leaders\hrule height \footrulewidth\hfill}}
\rhead{\color{lightgray}\uppercase{$group$}}
\rfoot{\color{lightgray}\hfill Page \thepage \ of \pageref*{LastPage}}
\lfoot{\color{lightgray}Confidential. Internal Use Only.}
}

\fancypagestyle{finalpage}{
\fancyhf{}
\renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{0.4pt}
\renewcommand{\footrulewidth}{0pt}
\renewcommand{\headrule}{\hbox to\headwidth{\color{lightgray}\leaders\hrule height \headrulewidth\hfill}}
\rhead{\color{lightgray}\uppercase{$group$}}
}

\fancypagestyle{firstpage}{
\fancyhf{}
\renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{0pt}
\renewcommand{\footrulewidth}{0.4pt}
\renewcommand{\footrule}{\hbox to\headwidth{\color{lightgray}\leaders\hrule height \footrulewidth\hfill}}
\rfoot{\color{lightgray}\hfill Page \thepage \ of \pageref*{LastPage}}
\lfoot{\color{lightgray}Confidential. Internal Use Only.}
}
```
### Defining Colors

```
\usepackage[table]{xcolor}

\definecolor{wellsFargoRed}{HTML}{BB0826}

```

### San Serif font

```
\usepackage{arev}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
```

### Titles for Section Heirarchy

```
\usepackage{titlesec}
\titleformat*{\section}
  {\sectionfont\fontsize{18}{21.6}\selectfont\color{wellsFargoRed}\bfseries}
\titleformat*{\subsection}
  {\sectionfont\fontsize{16}{19.2}\selectfont\color{wellsFargoRed}\bfseries}
\titleformat*{\subsubsection}
  {\sectionfont\fontsize{14}{16.8}\selectfont\color{wellsFargoRed}\bfseries}
\titleformat*{\paragraph}
  {\sectionfont\fontsize{13}{15.6}\selectfont\color{wellsFargoRed}\bfseries}
\titleformat*{\subparagraph}
  {\sectionfont\fontsize{12}{14.4}\selectfont\color{wellsFargoRed}\bfseries}
```

### Title Page

```
\thispagestyle{firstpage}

\begin{tikzpicture}[remember picture]
%% Logo Placement
    \node[rectangle, $if(boxes)$draw=$boxes$,$endif$ anchor=north east, inner sep=0in](logo) at (current page.north east)
      {\includegraphics[width=1in]{img/logo-flat}};

    \node[rectangle, $if(boxes)$draw=$boxes$,$endif$ anchor=north west, text width=\pgwidth - 2in, left](DateTMI) at (logo.west)
      {$if(date)${\fontsize{14}{16.8}\selectfont $date$ \par}$endif$ {\fontsize{18}{21.6}\selectfont Team Member Insights \par} {\fontsize{14}{16.8}\selectfont $group$ \par}};

     \node[rectangle, $if(boxes)$draw=$boxes$,$endif$ anchor=north east, text width=\pgwidth - 1in, inner ysep=0.1in](authors) at
      (logo.south east){$if(authors)$ $for(authors)$  $authors.name$ \hfill $endfor$ \\ $for(authors)$ $authors.email$ \hfill $endfor$ $endif$};

      \node[rectangle, $if(boxes)$draw=$boxes$,$endif$ anchor=north east, text width=\pgwidth - 1in](hrule) at
      (authors.south east){\rule{\textwidth}{4pt}};

\end{tikzpicture}




$if(title)${\fontsize{22}{26.4}\selectfont \textbf{$title$} \par}$endif$
$if(subtitle)${\fontsize{20}{24}\selectfont \textbf{$subtitle$} \par}$endif$
```
